mapper.sql: id, activity_name, appraise_id, begin_date, end_date, sign_End_date, activity_status, creator, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
,
from Appraised_Activity
where activity_name LIKE concat('%', #{param.activityName},'%')
ORDER by create_time desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select count(1) from Appraised_Activity
where activity_name LIKE concat('%', #{param.activityName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into Appraised_Activity (id, activity_name, appraise_id, begin_date, end_date, sign_End_date, activity_status, creator, create_time, update_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appraiseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update Appraised_Activity
activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appraise_id = #{appraiseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sign_End_date = #{signEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activity_status = #{activityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
